nodes.text: Atorra was a planet located in the Atorra system, a part of the Gordian Reach sector within the regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the Trans-Hydian. The planet was connected by the Ardan Cross hyperlane to the Troos and the Chenowei systems.

At some point, members of the sentient B'trillan species immigrated to Atorra, giving rise to a sparsely populated agricultural colony. By 43 ABY, however, decades of drought had ruined the colony. By that time, it was rumored that an ancient battle had resulted in the crash-landing of alien starships in Atorra's badlands.
Atorra was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and which placed the planet in grid square Q-5.
